ygData.msgSnippet: Sunhawk jumped, but a Photon Laser caught his leg.  He landed behind Nightshade.  He grabbed at her neck and attempted (happy know) to get the sword across her

Sunhawk jumped, but a Photon Laser caught his leg.  He
landed behind Nightshade.  He grabbed at her neck and
attempted (happy know) to get the sword across her
throat.

Sunhawk:  I wouldn't do that if I was you.  Now throw
any of those weapons that come off on the ground, and
any that don't throw down all your ammunition.

He turned on his comm to Talos.

Sunhawk:  TALOS, BOTH PREDS ARE LOOSE!  I'M TRYING TO
RESTRAIN THEM, BUT YOU MIGHT WANT TO SEND HOT ROD BACK
HERE.  HE WAS SUPPOSE TO GUARD THE FEMALE SO THIS IS
HIS MESS!  HE SHOULD HELP ME CLEAN IT UP!

--- RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He turned to face Sunhawk. A normal bot would not be
> able to respond, but DrillBit did not have to draw
> any weapon.
> Within a blink of an eye, DrillBit's right hand had
> converted to its gattaling gun mode, and was
> shooting 50 caliber rounds rapidly. Also machine gun
> fire erupted from all six of DrillBit's insect legs,
> as well as two optic photon lasers. All of this was
> right at Sunhawk at close range.
> 
> OOC: Ok to make this more clear, DB just unleashed
> the fire power of a small army on Sunhawk without
> flinching. And if I'm right, Sunhawk is facing
> DrillBit and another Predacon, and also has
> Nightshade behind him. Closed in, three to one.
>
